author: Fareed Zakaria
title: The coronavirus pandemic is not an economic crisis. It’s a health care crisis.
description: Cash to consumers cannot jump-start consumption. Relief to producers will not jump-start production.
content:
The distinction may sound academic. But understanding it is actually vital to designing the policies that should follow.

title: 29 soldiers killed in attack on army post in northern Mali
description: Mali's army says armed men attacked a military camp in the Gao region of the country's north, killing at least 29 soldiers
content:
BAMAKO, Mali Armed men attacked a Malian army camp in the Gao region in the north, killing at least 29 soldiers, the army said Thursday.
